pt-BR.name: Tambor de Leite
pt-BR.description: O tambor de leite, feito de metal ou madeira, é usado para armazenar e transportar leite em áreas rurais, com design robusto para preservar a qualidade do leite.

en.name: Milk Drum
en.description: The milk drum, also known as a milk canister or milk barrel, is a traditional container used to store and transport milk, especially in rural areas and dairy production contexts. Typically made from metal like aluminum, stainless steel, or wood, this drum has a robust and practical design that helps preserve milk quality.

es.name: Tambor de Leche
es.description: El tambor de leche, hecho de metal o madera, se usa para almacenar y transportar leche en áreas rurales, con un diseño robusto para preservar la calidad de la leche.
